5. Drivers for artifact storages¶

5.1. Local Filesystem Storage¶

Driver for artifact storage based on filesystem

class fuel_ci.drivers.storage.localfs.LocalFSDriver(obj)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class for local FS artifact storage driver

list_versions(storage, artifact)[source]¶

List versions of a given artifact available in current storage

Parameters:
  • storage – (ArtifactStorage) object
  • artifact – (Artifact) object with “name” attribute
Returns:

list of versions (strings)
download_artifact(storage, artifact)[source]¶

Search and download given artifact from current storage. Copies an artifact from local FS storage to path specified as “path” object attribute

Parameters:
  • storage – (ArtifactStorage) object
  • artifact – (Artifact) object with “name” and “url” attributes
Returns:

object, passed as artifact
search_artifact(storage, artifact)[source]¶

Search for given artifact in current storage

Parameters:
  • storage – (ArtifactStorage) object
  • artifact – (Artifact) object with “name” and “url” attributes
Returns:

object, passed as artifact, if found
publish_artifact(storage, artifact)[source]¶

Publish given artifact in current storage. Copies given artifact to local filesystem as binary file + meta.yaml, according to version

Parameters:
  • storage – (ArtifactStorage) object
  • artifact – (Artifact) object with “name”, “version”, “archive”, “packed” and “meta” attributes
Returns:

object, passed as artifact, if found
fuel_ci.drivers.storage.localfs.driver_class¶

transforming LocalFSDriver class into driver

alias of LocalFSDriver
